titleStmt.title: The case of the two absolvers that were tryed at the Kings-Bench-Bar at Westminster on Thursday the 2d of July 1696 for giving absolution at the place of execution to Sir John Friend and Sir William Parkens.
titleStmt.author: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Jeremy Collier--British museum catalogue.
